tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Jaya Ranganath along with Dr Sudeep K N have taken the highest care of my mother at Apollo Seshadripuram. Having seen the highest complication and very low survival possibilities, they have done a miraculous job of reviving my mothers heart condition, bringing it to stability and ensure the right attention and treatment is giving at every stage of the process.  Words fall short of such a wonderful treatment given and definitely recommend them very very strongly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Highly recommend for Pediatric Cardiology ,He listens to our concerns , He diagonised very quickly , advised correctly and a very confident Doctor , seeing his confidence i was well assured that our baby was in the safe hands. I consulted many other doctors and finally came back to him .

Excellent experience, everything was more than expected.
Doctor did his best to satisfy me. I am happy

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Fantastic Doctor, listens to patients truly and correctly rated No 1 in Bengaluru. Zero wait time friendly reception and nursing staff. 2 procedures completed in 30 minutes well handled. Very good Hospital.

I had appointment at 4:30 PM at Apollo Seshadripuram, Bangalore. I got a call from Apollo at around 10AM asking me to come at 1PM. When I reached there by 1PM, I was made to wait for 45 mins before telling me that doctor is in OT. There was no other patient.

When I go with a baby, obviously it is difficult to wait longer. So the waiting period should be cut down. The consultation was quick but it took a lot of time for Echo test. I visit there once in a year for my child's annual check up and have experienced good service at the hospital. I am very happy with the doctor too. He is excellent and genial.
A great doctor. *** ********* *** ******** explains the issues very well, and is quite conservative.
*** ** *** **** ******* Visited for cardiac related general check up. Doctor shared good tips to maintain cardiac health.
Doctor has patience and will answer all the doubts we have.  I would recommend this doctor for all the heart problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Congenital Birth Defects in the Heart Correction,
review: Dr. Jayaranganth is a very friendly doctor. Understands concerns of families . He is Extremely reassuring for families when they are going through troubled times.  We felt relieved after our kid was seen by this  doctor.
